module.name: Voicemail Blasting
module.description: Creates a group of extensions that calls a group of voicemail boxes and allows you to leave a message for them all at once.
module.changelog: *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11854 Add clicktoedit to password *13.0.7* FREEPBX-11269 *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10677 *13.0.5* Slide out menu *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9174 Change int to bigint *13.0.3* FREEPBX-10336 Fix audio label field *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.1* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *2.11.0.4* #1953 *2.11.0.2* update license *2.11.0.1* #6055 *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.2* #5478 *2.10.0.1* #5463 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.3* spellings *2.9.0.2* #4850 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
